content: TOKYO  Dec 21 Japanese electronics maker Panasonic Corp is set to buy U.S. refrigeration firm Hussmann for over 186.6 billion yen ($1.5 billion) in a deal it says will leverage its technology and help it break into the U.S. food distribution industry.
name: Ingersoll-Rand plc (Ireland)
title: UPDATE 1-Panasonic buys U.S. refrigeration firm Hussmann for $1.5 bln
